featured.text: Furthermore, watching horror movies can disturb sleep patterns, as the residual fear and anxiety they evoke may keep people awake all night, thus leading to fatigue and irritability the following day.
They usually would not leave people’s houses until they were sure their customers were awake.
You can be an everyday Jane Doe or John Smith while awake but a superhero while sleeping, 30 who you are in real life.

other.text: To keep your pet awake for a while.
When a person is having a lucid dream, the person’s body is 27 ; when a person daydreams, his/her body is awake.
they awake, all of the women of child-bearing age have become pregnant.

definition.example: I usually feel more productive when I am awake early in the morning.
